alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 1:29PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Bernard, central Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 200 PM CDT... At 128 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Myrtle Grove, or 13 miles southeast of Belle Chasse, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belle Chasse, Port Sulphur, Jean Lafitte, Myrtle Grove, Violet, Pointe A La Hache, Poydras, Barataria and Lafitte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Coastal Jefferson; Lower Jefferson; Lower Plaquemines; Lower St. Bernard; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard
